member.name: T:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer
member.summary: A utility class for serializing objects into Xaml. Does not recognize UI concepts such as DependencyProperties.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.XamlNamespace
member.summary: The namespace for Xaml language features (commonly prefixed as "x:")

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.AttachedProperties
member.summary: A mapping of target types to discovered attached properties. Derived classes can pre-populate this collection.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.BuiltIn
member.summary: A TypeConverter that knows how to convert built-in (i.e. mscorlib) types to strings.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.DiscoveredTypes
member.summary: A set of the types that have already had their attached properties discovered.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.PropEquals
member.summary: An IEqualityComparer that compares two PropertyInfo objects for equality.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.PropertiesToSkip
member.summary: A set of properties to skip when serializing in order to avoid properties that will inevitably throw.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.RefEquals
member.summary: An IEqualityComparer that checks to see if two items refer to the same object (reference equality).

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.TypeConverters
member.summary: Supplemental TypeConverters (in case a supplied TypeConverter is missing or lacks a ConvertTo implementation).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a XamlSerializer.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.DiscoverAttachedProperties(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Searches an assembly for attached properties that can be serialized in Xaml.
member.param: The assembly to search.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.DiscoverAttachedProperties(System.Type)
member.summary: Searches a type for attached properties that can be serialized in Xaml.
member.param: The type to search.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.RegisterAttachedProperty(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Registers an attached property for serialization explicitly based upon its getter and setter.
member.param: The getter for the attached property.
The setter for the attached property.
member.returns: true if the attached property was valid and registered, otherwise false.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.Serialize(System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes an object to Xaml.
member.param: The object to serialize.
member.returns: A Xaml string representing the object.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.CanWriteObject(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Checks to see whether an object can be serialized in Xaml.
member.param: The object to be serialized.
The set of objects currently on the stack (used to avoid cycles).
member.returns: true if the object can be serialized, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.CanWriteProperty(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Checks to see whether a property is writeable (and thus can be serialized).
member.param: The property to check.
member.returns: true if the property can be written, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.GetAttachedOrder(SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.AttachedProperty)
member.summary: Gets a string for an attached property used to determine the order in which attached properties will be serialized.
member.param: The attached property being serialized.
member.returns: A sortable string representation for the attached property.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.GetAttachedProperties(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets all of the attached properties that could be applied to the specified type (or its base types or interfaces).
member.param: The type for which attached properties should be retrieved.
member.returns: A collection of attached properties for the given type.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.GetContentProperty(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the ContentProperty for the given object.
member.param: The object being serialized.
member.returns: The ContentProperty for the given object, or null if one is not specified.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.GetNamespace(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Gets the xml namespace for the given type.
member.param: The type whose namespace must be retrieved.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
member.returns: The xml namespace for the type.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.GetPrefix(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Xml.XmlWriter)
member.summary: Gets an Xml prefix for the given namespace, taking into consideration any existing prefixes in the XmlWriter.
member.param: The namespace for which a namespace must be assigned.
Existing prefix mappings.
The writer which will consume the prefix.
member.returns: A prefix for the given namespace.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.GetPropertyGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Gets the property getter.
member.param: The PropertyInfo from which to get the getter.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.GetPropertyOrder(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Gets a string for a property used to determine the order in which properties will be serialized.
member.param: The property being serialized.
member.returns: A sortable string representation for the property.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.GetTypeConverter(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Gets the TypeConverter for the given property or attached property.
member.param: The property or getter for the attached property.
member.returns: The TypeConverter to be used for serialization if one exists, otherwise null.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.GetXmlWriter(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Gets an XmlWriter for the given StringBuilder, and can be used to customize formatting settings for the Xaml.
member.param: The StringBuilder into which the writer will emit Xaml.
member.returns: An XmlWriter to be used for serialization.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.IsDictionary(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines whether a type matches the dictionary interface that Xaml supports.
member.param: The type to check.
member.returns: true if the type is a supported dictionary type, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.IsInlinable(System.Object,System.Object,System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Determines whether the given property can be written inline (as an attribute) rather than using object-element syntax.
member.param: The object on which the property is being set.
The value of the property being set.
The identifier for the property being set (a PropertyInfo for a property, and the getter MethodInfo for an attached property).
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.IsInlineAttachedProperty(System.Object,System.Object,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Determines whether an attached property can be serialized in attribute form rather than using object-element syntax.
member.param: The object on which the attached property is set.
The value of the attached property.
The getter for the attached property.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).
member.returns: true if the attached property can be written as an attribute, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.IsInlineProperty(System.Object,System.Object,System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Determines whether a property can be serialized in attribute form rather than using object-element syntax.
member.param: The object on which the property is set.
The value of the property.
The property to serialize.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).
member.returns: true if the property can be written as an attribute, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.IsList(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines whether a type matches the collection interface that Xaml supports.
member.param: The type to check.
member.returns: true if the type is a supported collection type, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.IsUnique(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Determines whether an object is unique given the items on the stack.
member.param: The object to check.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).
member.returns: true if the object is unique, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.PostSerialize(System.Object,System.String@)
member.summary: Called after serialization (and can be used for cleanup).
member.param: The object being serialized.
The serialized Xaml, which can be modified for cleanup during this method.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.PreSerialize(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Called before serialization (and can be used for initialization).
member.param: The object being serialized.
The initial dictionary of prefixes, which can be primed for custom serializers.
The set of objects on the stack, which can be primed if certain objects must be avoided.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.ShouldSerialize(System.Object,System.Object,System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether a property should be serialized (based upon the DefaultAttribute and ShouldSerialize methods).
member.param: The object being serialized.
The value of the property being serialized.
The property being serialized.
member.returns: true if the property should be serialized, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.VisitAfterAttributes(System.Object,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Called after all properties that can be written as attributes (rather than in object-element syntax) are written, but before an object-element content is written. Use this virtual as an opportunity to inject additional attributes before the object is written.
member.param: The object being serialized.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.VisitAfterBeginElement(System.Object,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Called immediately after the BeginElement for the object being serialized has been written.
member.param: The object being serialized.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.VisitAlternateContent(System.Object,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Called when an object's Content property was not set, allowing special types (e.g. Templates) whose content properties are not discoverable publicly, to be serialized.
member.param: The object being serialized.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.summary: Serializes an attached property on an object.
member.param: The object on which the attached property is set.
The value of the attached property.
The name of the attached property.
The getter method for the attached property.
The setter method for the attached property.
The writer being used to serialize the object.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects currently on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.VisitBeforeEndElement(System.Object,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Called immediately before the EndElement for the object being serialized is called. Can be used for cleanup.
member.param: The object being serialized.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.summary: Serializes the contents of a collection.
member.param: The collection being serialized.

member.summary: Serializes the contents of a dictionary.

member.summary: Serializes a key for an object (usually as "x:Key"). The writer will be in attribute mode.
member.param: The key to serialize.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.VisitObject(System.Object,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object},System.Boolean,System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes an object into Xaml.
member.param: The object to serialize.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection)
A value indicating whether this object is the root of the document.
A value that represents the key for this object, or null if the object has no key (and hence is not in a dictionary).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.VisitProperty(System.Object,System.Object,System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,System.Boolean,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Serializes a property.
member.param: The object on which the property is set.
The value of the property.
The property being set.
A value indicating that the property is the ContentProperty for the object, and thus no property elements need to be generated.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.XamlSerializer.DelegateEqualityComparer`1.GetHashCode(`0)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, serves as a hash function for the specified object for hashing algorithms and data structures, such as a hash table.
member.returns: A hash code for the specified object.
member.param: The object for which to get a hash code.
member.exception: The type of is a reference type and is null.
